title: Abijah’s Victory Over Israel
summary: King Abijah of Judah confronts Jeroboam and Israel in battle. He appeals to God's covenant and declares Judah’s loyalty to the Lord. Though outnumbered, Judah wins because they trust in God.

faq.question: How did Judah win against Israel?
faq.answer: They relied on God, who gave them victory despite being outnumbered.

faq.question: What was Abijah’s message to Israel?
faq.answer: That Judah followed God and had the rightful priesthood and kingship.
